description:
Asciidoc Book Editor based on JavaFX 20

Asciidoc FX is a book / document editor to build PDF, Epub, Mobi and HTML books, documents and slides. AsciidocFX is also a winner of Dukeâ€™s Choice Award 2015.
- Support optional in include processor
- Fix counter issue
- Extra extension matchers
- Scrolling improvements
- JavaFX upgrade
All notable changes are documented in this file.
